docs.title: 主页
docs.text:
不一样的文件管理器

体验简洁的操作界面，依托 tkinter 语法和 ttkbootstrap 美化库，确保流畅且高效的文件操作。

快速使用 了解更多

docs.title: 一款开源的、轻量的 Windows 文件管理器，致力于 GUI 打造与应用实现。
预览
docs.text: 浅色主题 深色主题

docs.title: 核心优势
docs.text:
• 简洁美观 现代界面设计，注重用户交互体验。

  • 轻量高效 快速响应，无繁琐配置，资源占用低。

  • 操作便捷 高效且直观的文件浏览与管理，简化使用流程。

  • 自由定制 自由扩展和个性化定制，提升管理效率。

  • 开源免费 允许用户根据需求对源代码进行修改和优化。

  • 持续更新 定期发布新功能和改进。

docs.title: 项目活跃度
docs.text: Made with Love

docs.title: 贡献者致谢
docs.text:
提示

在此，向所有帮助项目成长的贡献者表示衷心感谢！

docs.title: 开源库致谢
docs.text:
在这里仅列出主要的几项：

  • tkinter Python 的标准 GUI 工具包，为项目提供基础 GUI 支持。

  • ttkbootstrap tkinter 和 ttk 的现代风格扩展，带来美观的界面设计。

  • winshell 简化 Windows 平台桌面管理任务。

  • pystray 实现系统托盘功能。

  • pyinstaller 将 Python 项目打包成独立可执行文件。

提示

开源世界因分享而精彩，感谢每一位默默无闻为开源事业做出贡献的人们。

docs.title: 推荐项目
docs.text:
以下是启发我们的优秀项目，推荐大家尝试：

  • Tk-Path-Finder 带选项卡的 Windows 文件资源管理器，使用 ttkbootstrap 开发。

  • biscuit 快速、可扩展的本机 IDE（大小 < 20MB）。

  • mkdocs-material 构建本网站的优雅文档框架。

docs.title: 图标来源
docs.text:
• Icons8 提供精美图标资源。

  • IconFont 提供高质量的矢量图标。

特别鸣谢

感谢亲爱的朋友们和用户们的推荐与肯定，你们的支持是项目前进的动力！

docs.title: 作者
docs.text:
我是 pyheight，我的兴趣在于计算机学习，特别是 Python 编程和软件开发。 具体地说，我喜欢探索新技术，将想法转化为实际的项目。

提示

编程不仅是技术，更是创造的艺术。

docs.title: 开源协议
docs.text:
本项目根据 Apache-2.0 license 获得许可。

这意味着您可以：

  • 自由使用 在个人或商业项目中免费使用。

  • 修改代码 根据需求调整源代码。

  • 分发软件 分享原始或修改后的版本。

  • 再许可 在遵守协议的前提下进行再授权。

docs.title: 使用须知
docs.text:
graph LR
    A[用户] --> B(使用软件)
    B --> C{义务}
    C --> D[保留版权声明]
    C --> E[注明修改]
    C --> F[包含许可证]
    B --> G{权利}
    G --> H[免费使用]
    G --> I[修改代码]
    G --> J[商业应用]

docs.title: 注意事项
docs.text:
• 安全警告 软件二次分发存在巨大安全风险，请务必通过官方渠道下载。

  • 免责声明 软件不保证可用性，由于使用软件而产生的任何损失均由用户自行承担。

  • 版权说明 图标资源来自互联网，版权属于相关网站，软件仅供学习参考使用。

  • 转载要求 欢迎转载本软件，但必须附上项目地址，未注明来源的转载行为均视为未授权。

docs.title: 隐私政策
docs.text: 最后更新日期：2025年8月13日 生效日期：2025年8月11日

docs.title: 重要提示
docs.text:
在使用本网站前，请您仔细阅读并理解本政策。您对本政策的同意是自愿的，您有权选择同意或不同意。未获得您的明确同意前，本网站不会收集您的个人信息。

本网站使用百度统计（Baidu Analytics）服务，该服务会收集部分访问数据用于流量分析。 继续访问即表示您知悉并接受此数据收集行为。

docs.title: 1.1 处理目的
docs.text:
本网站仅出于以下明确、合理的目的处理您的个人信息：

  • 分析网站使用情况

  • 改进内容和服务体验

  • 统计访问量（无个人身份识别）

docs.title: 1.2 处理方式与范围
docs.text:
处理方式：自动化采集、匿名化处理

处理范围：

  • IP 地址（匿名化处理）

  • 设备信息（类型、操作系统）

  • 浏览行为（访问页面、停留时间）

  • 来源信息（引荐链接）

docs.title: 2.1 百度统计服务
docs.text:
本网站使用百度统计（Baidu Analytics）进行流量分析。

  1. 百度将按中国法律要求存储相关数据

  2. 原始数据由百度统计服务收集并处理，我们仅获取汇总后的统计分析数据，不涉及个人身份信息

  3. 百度统计的完整隐私条款见：《百度统计隐私政策》

docs.title: 2.2 其他第三方服务
docs.text: 当前无其他第三方 SDK 或服务处理您的个人信息。如有新增，将在政策更新时明确告知。

docs.title: 3.1 Cookie 类型
docs.text: 类别 名称 用途 有效期 必要 Cookie consent 存储您的同意状态 1年 统计 Cookie HMACCOUNT 百度统计用户标识 浏览器会话 偏好 Cookie lang 语言设置存储 30天

docs.title: 3.2 您的控制权
docs.text:
您可通过浏览器设置禁用 Cookie，但可能导致功能受限。特别是，禁用 Cookie 将阻止百度统计收集您的浏览数据。

立即修改 Cookie 设置

如需重新同意使用 Cookie，需点击管理设定按钮，勾选百度统计 (Baidu Analytics)。

docs.title: 4.  您的权利
docs.text:
根据《中华人民共和国个人信息保护法》，您享有：

  1. 访问权：查询个人信息处理情况

  2. 删除权：要求删除您的个人信息

  3. 撤回同意权：随时撤回处理授权

  4. 解释权：要求说明处理规则

由于部分数据由第三方服务（如百度统计）直接收集，您行使上述权利时，我们可能需要将您的请求转交给第三方，或指导您直接向第三方提出。

docs.title: 5.  政策更新
docs.text:
1. 重大变更将通过网站公告告知

  2. 更新生效后继续使用视为接受新政策

docs.title: 6.  联系我们
docs.text: 有关隐私问题请联系：pyheight@qq.com

docs.title: 前言
docs.text:
这是作者的第一个真正意义上的项目。

建议

打好基础至关重要——正因为大多数人不愿去做，它才显得尤为珍贵。

docs.title: 项目理念
docs.text:
为什么开发文件管理器？

虽然看似基础，但文件管理器是操作系统核心组件的完美实践。

通过这个项目：

  • 深入理解 GUI 编程核心概念
  • 掌握复杂界面组件交互设计
  • 探索 Python 桌面应用的极限

docs.title: 核心优势
docs.text:
graph LR
    A[开发者] --> B(学习 GUI 编程)
    B --> C{应用场景}
    C --> D[桌面应用]
    C --> E[工具开发]
    C --> F[教育项目]
    D --> G[ttk file explorer]
    E --> H[...]
    F --> H[...]
优势 描述 简洁优雅 采用 ttkbootstrap 打造的现代化界面，告别传统 tkinter 的陈旧外观 高效轻量 极低的资源占用，在老旧设备上也能流畅运行 完全开源 Apache-2.0 license 保障自由使用和修改 学习价值 编程爱好者可从源码中学习完整 GUI 开发流程

docs.title: 当前限制
docs.text:
• 平台限制 目前仅支持 Windows 系统，因底层 API 依赖。

  • 功能限制 无法完全替代系统文件管理器，定位为开发参考案例。

docs.title: 交流互动
docs.text:
• 查看项目愿景

  • 参与开发

  • 提出任何问题、建议或想法

提示

每个伟大的项目都始于一个简单的想法和坚定的决心。让我们一起探索更多可能！

docs.title: 贡献者墙
docs.text:
感谢每一位贡献者

您的参与让 ttk file explorer 变得更好！

docs.title: 成为贡献者
docs.text:
1. 提交 PR 您的 PR 被合并后

  2. 加入名单 成为官方贡献者

  3. 展示成就 列入贡献者墙

docs.title: 贡献方式
docs.text:
• 报告问题或建议 在 GitHub 创建 Issue · 提供详细描述 · 包含相关环境信息

  • 文档贡献 修改 Markdown 文件 · 更正错误，提升质量 · 更新功能描述和指南

  • 代码贡献 选择现有问题或新功能 · 遵循 PEP8 编码规范 · 创建 Pull Request

  • 其他贡献 即使是小贡献也很重要！任何修正和改进都值得赞赏。

docs.title: 开始步骤
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Fork 仓库] --> B[克隆仓库]
  B --> C[创建新分支]
  C --> D[编写代码/文档]
  D --> E[提交并推送]
  E --> F[创建 PR]

  1. Fork 仓库

    访问 GitHub 仓库并点击Fork按钮

  2. 克隆仓库 

    git clone https://github.com/pyheight/ttk-file-explorer.git
cd ttk-file-explorer

  3. 创建新分支 

    git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name

  4. 编写代码或文档

    代码修改在src/目录 文档修改在docs/目录

  5. 提交并推送 

    git add .
git commit -m "描述您的更改"
git push origin feature/your-feature-name

  6. 创建 PR

    在 GitHub 仓库页面点击New Pull Request按钮

docs.title: 贡献规范
docs.text:
• 编码风格 遵循 PEP8 规范。

  • 文档要求 所有新功能需附带文档。

  • 测试要求 核心功能需包含单元测试。

  • 提交信息 清晰描述变更内容。

docs.title: 更多参考
docs.text:
• 完整贡献指南

  • Good First Issues

  • 提出任何问题、建议或想法

提示

期待您的贡献！

docs.title: 仅最新版本会积极接收更新
docs.text:
遇到问题或有建议

您的反馈很重要，帮助我们改进 ttk file explorer！

您可以选择以下任一方式反馈：

GitHub Issues 发起讨论 电子邮件 在此评论反馈

docs.title: 报告要求
docs.text:
请提供以下信息

  1. 问题描述 遇到的问题 · 发生频率和条件

  2. 重现步骤 第一步操作 · 第二步操作 · 观察到的结果

  3. 环境信息 操作系统版本 · 软件版本

  4. 附加信息 截图或屏幕录制 · 错误日志（如有） · 联系方式（可选）

docs.title: 报告指南
docs.text:
报告类型 处理优先级 建议提交渠道 严重错误程序崩溃/数据丢失 GitHub Issues 功能请求新功能/改进建议 发起讨论 或 在此评论反馈 使用问题配置/操作指导 发起讨论 或 在此评论反馈

提示

我们会在收到报告后尽快处理，感谢您的耐心与支持！

docs.title: 提交前检查
docs.text:
• 已搜索现有问题
  • 包含必要环境信息
  • 提供清晰的重现步骤

docs.title: 在此评论反馈
docs.text: 您可以直接在此页面提交反馈或建议

docs.title: 计划版本
docs.text:
即将到来：v1.1.0-beta

graph LR
    A[当前架构] --> B[MVC 重构]
    B --> C[功能完善]
    C --> D[v1.1.0-beta]
    D --> E[更稳定的基础]
    E --> F[未来扩展]

docs.title: 架构重构
docs.text:
graph TD
    Model[数据模型] -->|提供数据| Controller
    View[用户界面] -->|发送操作| Controller
    Controller[控制器] -->|更新数据| Model
    Controller -->|更新显示| View

  • 模型层(Model)：分离数据管理和业务逻辑

  • 视图层(View)：专注 UI 呈现和用户交互

  • 控制层(Controller)：协调模型和视图之间的交互

核心目标

实现真正的 MVC 架构。

docs.title: 功能完善计划
docs.text:
• 文件操作增强 高级复制/移动操作 搜索功能优化

  • 界面效果优化 自定义布局预设 自定义主题

  • 系统集成 完善右键菜单 导航功能优化 快捷键自定义

docs.title: 时间规划
docs.text:
开发窗口

考虑到学业安排，主要开发工作将在以下时间段进行：

  • 寒假期间 (1月-2月)
  • 暑假期间 (7月-8月)

其余时间将进行零星的开发和维护工作。

docs.title: 参与方式
docs.text:
• 开发协助 欢迎熟悉 MVC 架构的开发者参与贡献

  • 测试反馈 体验测试版并报告问题

  • 功能建议 分享对文件管理器的需求想法

docs.title: 跨平台说明
docs.text:
当前平台限制

graph LR
    A[tkinter GUI] --> B[跨平台]
    C[文件操作 API] --> D[仅 Windows 实现]
    D --> E[深度系统集成]
    E --> F[Windows API 调用]
  • tkinter 虽然是跨平台的，但文件操作 API 目前仅针对 Windows 实现。
  • macOS/Linux 构建需要重写文件操作模块。
  • 当前开发环境限定在 Windows，源代码仅支持 Windows 构建。

docs.title: Python 版本兼容性
docs.text:
操作系统 Python 版本要求 说明 Windows 7 ≤ 3.8 最后一个支持 Win7 的版本 Windows 8/10/11 ≥ 3.7 推荐使用 Python 3.10+

Windows 7 特殊要求

由于共享库链接的 DLL 限制，Windows 7 最后一个兼容版本是 Python 3.8。

docs.title: 系统环境变量配置
docs.text:
在打包前可能需手动设置

键对值示例
TCL_LIBRARY: tcl_library_path
TK_LIBRARY: tk_library_path
为什么需要这个

在某些系统（如 Windows 7）上，PyInstaller 可能无法找到init.tcl文件，导致打包失败。

docs.title: 所需依赖
docs.text:
• 网页处理 beautifulsoup4 · Markdown · Requests

  • 文档处理 chardet · openpyxl · python_docx · python_pptx · fpdf

  • 图像处理 Pillow

  • 系统工具 psutil · watchdog · winshell · pywin32 · pystray · darkdetect

  • 打包工具 pyinstaller

  • 界面美化 ttkbootstrap

docs.title: 构建步骤
docs.text:
1. 前置条件

    确保已经安装了Python 3.x环境

  2. 下载或克隆仓库 

    git clone https://github.com/pyheight/ttk-file-explorer.git

  3. 导航到源码目录 

    cd ttk-file-explorer/src

  4. 安装依赖

    安装指定版本（推荐）安装最新版本 
    pip install -r requirements.txt

    pip install -r requirements_latest.txt

  5. 启动应用 

    python main.py

  6. 打包应用 

    python script/package.py

遇到问题

让我们来解决它

docs.title: 关于项目
docs.text:
• 许可证 本项目根据 Apache-2.0 license 获得许可。

  • 使用须知 免费开源 | 严禁出售 | 欢迎转载

  • 项目维护 目前由作者一人维护，需要大量私人时间与精力，欢迎参与贡献。

  • 支持项目 您的支持意义重大，请在 GitHub 给我一个 Star ！

docs.title: 下载最新版
docs.text:
当前最新版本：

GitHub下载 百度网盘 :aliyunpan: 阿里云盘

安全提示

软件二次分发存在巨大安全风险，请务必通过官方渠道下载。

docs.title: 下载说明
docs.text:
• 安装版 (.exe) 适合大多数用户 · 自动创建开始菜单项 · 包含卸载程序

  • 便携版 (.zip) 解压即用 · 不修改系统注册表 · 适合U盘携带

提示

两种方式内容相同，任选其一即可。

docs.title: 下载建议
docs.text: 下载渠道 推荐度 速度 更新及时性 支持文件类型 备注  GitHub ★★★★★ ★★★★ 实时 .exe，.zip，.tar.gz 官方首选  百度网盘 ★★★☆☆ ★★☆☆ 延迟 .exe，.zip 需要登录 :aliyunpan: 阿里云盘 ★★★★☆ ★★★★ 延迟 .exe 推荐备用

docs.title: 操作系统
docs.text:
操作系统 支持状态 最低版本要求 备注说明 Windows ✅ 7 完全支持 Windows ✅ 8/10/11 最佳体验 macOS ❌ 未来计划支持 Linux ❌ 未来计划支持

软件版本兼容性说明

  • v1.0.0-beta及以上版本：支持 Windows 7 及以上系统
  • v1.0.0-beta以前版本：仅支持 Windows 10 及以上系统

docs.title: 架构要求
docs.text:
64位系统 32位系统

32 位系统不支持的原因
  1. ttkbootstrap 版本限制
  2. 其他依赖库兼容性问题
graph LR
    A[ttkbootstrap 版本限制] -->|导致| B(API 限制 & 缺少32位支持)
    D[其他依赖库兼容性问题] -->|引发| E(文件操作失败 & 依赖冲突)
    B --> G[无法运行]
    E --> G

docs.title: 硬件要求
docs.text:
组件 最低要求 推荐配置 说明 处理器 1 GHz 单核 2 GHz 双核 现代处理器性能更佳 内存 512 MB RAM 1 GB RAM 复杂操作需要更多内存 存储空间 50 MB 可用 100 MB 可用 用于程序文件和临时文件 显示器 1024×768 分辨率 1920×1080 分辨率 更高分辨率体验更佳

提示

大多数现代计算机都能轻松满足这些要求。

docs.title: Home
docs.text:
A Different Kind of File Manager

Experience a clean interface built with tkinter syntax and ttkbootstrap library, ensuring smooth and efficient file operations.

Quick Start Learn More

docs.title: An open-source, lightweight Windows file manager dedicated to GUI development and application implementation.
Preview
docs.text: Light Theme Dark Theme

docs.title: Core Advantages
docs.text:
• Sleek & Modern Modern interface design focused on user interaction experience.

  • Lightweight & Efficient Fast response, no complex configurations, low resource usage.

  • Easy Operations Efficient and intuitive file browsing and management to simplify workflows.

  • Customizable Freely extendable and customizable to enhance management efficiency.

  • Open Source & Free Allows users to modify and optimize source code according to their needs.

  • Continuous Updates Regular releases of new features and improvements.

docs.title: Project Activity
docs.text: Made with Love

docs.title: Contributor Acknowledgments
docs.text:
Tip

Sincere gratitude to all contributors who have helped this project grow!

docs.title: Open Source Library Acknowledgments
docs.text:
Listing only the major ones:

  • tkinter Python's standard GUI toolkit, providing foundational GUI support.

  • ttkbootstrap Modern styling extension for tkinter and ttk, enabling beautiful interface design.

  • winshell Simplifies desktop management tasks on Windows platform.

  • pystray Implements system tray functionality.

  • pyinstaller Packages Python projects into standalone executables.

Tip

The open-source world thrives on sharing, thank you to everyone who contributes to open-source.

docs.title: Recommended Projects
docs.text:
Excellent projects that inspired us, highly recommended:

  • Tk-Path-Finder Windows file explorer with tabs, developed using ttkbootstrap.

  • biscuit Fast, extensible native IDE (size < 20MB).

  • mkdocs-material Elegant documentation framework powering this website.

docs.title: Icon Sources
docs.text:
• Icons8 Provides beautiful icon resources.

  • IconFont Offers high-quality vector icons.

Special Thanks

To dear friends and users for your recommendations and affirmations, your support is the driving force behind this project!

docs.title: Author
docs.text:
I am pyheight, passionate about computer learning, especially Python programming and software development. Specifically, I enjoy exploring new technologies and turning ideas into practical projects.

Tip

Programming is not just technology, but the art of creation.

docs.title: Important Notes
docs.text:
• Security Warning Software redistribution poses significant security risks. Always download from official channels.

  • Disclaimer Software comes with no availability guarantees. Any losses from software use are the user's responsibility.

  • Copyright Notice Icon resources are from the internet with copyright belonging to respective sites. Software is for learning reference only.

  • Reposting Requirements Sharing this software is welcome but must include the project URL. Uncredited reposts are considered unauthorized.

docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text: Last Updated: August 13, 2025 Effective Date: August 11, 2025

docs.title: Important Notice
docs.text:
Before using this website, please carefully read and understand this policy. Your consent to this policy is voluntary, and you have the right to agree or disagree. This website will not collect your personal information without your explicit consent.

This website uses Baidu Analytics (Baidu Tongji) service, which collects certain visit data for traffic analysis. By continuing to access this site, you acknowledge and accept this data collection practice.

docs.title: 1.1 Processing Purposes
docs.text:
This website processes your personal information only for the following explicit and legitimate purposes:

  • Analyze website usage

  • Improve content and service experience

  • Count visits (without personal identification)

docs.title: 1.2 Processing Methods and Scope
docs.text:
Processing Methods: Automated collection, anonymized processing

Processing Scope:

  • IP Address (anonymized)

  • Device Information (type, operating system)

  • Browsing Behavior (pages visited, duration)

  • Referral Information (source links)

docs.title: 2.1 Baidu Analytics Service
docs.text:
This website uses Baidu Analytics (Baidu Tongji) for traffic analysis.

  1. Baidu will store relevant data as required by Chinese laws

  2. Raw data is collected and processed by Baidu Analytics. We only receive aggregated statistical analysis data without personal identification

  3. Complete privacy terms for Baidu Analytics: Baidu Analytics Privacy Policy

docs.title: 2.2 Other Third-Party Services
docs.text: Currently no other third-party SDKs or services process your personal information. Any additions will be explicitly announced during policy updates.

docs.title: 3.1 Cookie Types
docs.text: Category Name Purpose Duration Essential Cookie consent Stores your consent status 1 year Analytics Cookie HMACCOUNT Baidu Analytics user identifier Browser session Preference Cookie lang Language setting storage 30 days

docs.title: 3.2 Your Control Rights
docs.text:
You can disable cookies through browser settings, but this may limit functionality. Specifically, disabling cookies will prevent Baidu Analytics from collecting your browsing data.

Modify Cookie Settings Now

To re-consent to cookie usage, click the management settings button and select Baidu Analytics.

docs.title: 4.  Your Rights
docs.text:
Under the Personal Information Protection Law of China, you have:

  1. Access Right: Inquire about personal information processing

  2. Deletion Right: Request deletion of your personal information

  3. Withdrawal Right: Withdraw processing consent at any time

  4. Explanation Right: Request clarification of processing rules

Since some data is collected directly by third-party services (e.g., Baidu Analytics), we may need to forward your requests to these parties or guide you to contact them directly when exercising these rights.

docs.title: 5.  Policy Updates
docs.text:
1. Major changes will be announced through website notices

  2. Continued use after updates constitutes acceptance of the new policy

docs.title: 6.  Contact Us
docs.text: For privacy concerns, please contact: pyheight@qq.com

docs.title: Foreword
docs.text:
This is the author's first substantial project.

Suggestion

Building a solid foundation is crucial - precisely because most people are unwilling to do it, it becomes especially valuable.

docs.title: Project Philosophy
docs.text:
Why develop a file manager?

While seemingly basic, a file manager is the perfect practice for core operating system components.

Through this project:

  • Deeply understand core GUI programming concepts
  • Master complex UI component interaction design
  • Explore the limits of Python desktop applications

docs.title: Core Advantages
docs.text:
graph LR
    A[Developer] --> B(Learn GUI Programming)
    B --> C{Application Scenarios}
    C --> D[Desktop Applications]
    C --> E[Tool Development]
    C --> F[Educational Projects]
    D --> G[ttk file explorer]
    E --> H[...]
    F --> H[...]
Advantage Description Elegant Simplicity Modern interface built with ttkbootstrap, leaving behind traditional tkinter's dated appearance Lightweight Efficiency Extremely low resource consumption, runs smoothly even on older hardware Fully Open Source Apache-2.0 license guarantees freedom to use and modify Educational Value Programming enthusiasts can learn complete GUI development workflows from the source code

docs.title: Current Limitations
docs.text:
• Platform Constraints Currently only supports Windows due to underlying API dependencies.

  • Functional Limitations Not intended to fully replace system file managers; positioned as a development reference case.

docs.text:
• View Project Vision

  • Participate in Development

Tip

Every great project begins with a simple idea and unwavering determination. Let's explore more possibilities together!

docs.title: Contributors Wall
docs.text:
Thanks to Every Contributor

Your participation makes ttk file explorer better!

docs.title: Become a Contributor
docs.text:
1. Submit a PR After your PR is merged

  2. Join the List Become an official contributor

  3. Showcase Achievement Listed on the Contributors Wall

docs.title: Contribution Methods
docs.text:
• Report Issues or Suggestions Create GitHub Issues · Provide detailed descriptions · Include relevant environment information

  • Documentation Contributions Modify Markdown files · Correct errors, improve quality · Update feature descriptions and guides

  • Code Contributions Select existing issues or new features · Follow PEP8 coding standards · Create Pull Requests

  • Other Contributions Even small contributions matter! Any fixes and improvements are appreciated.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Fork Repository] --> B[Clone Repository]
  B --> C[Create New Branch]
  C --> D[Write Code/Docs]
  D --> E[Commit & Push]
  E --> F[Create PR]

  1. Fork Repository

    Visit GitHub repository and click Fork button

  2. Clone Repository 

    git clone https://github.com/pyheight/ttk-file-explorer.git
cd ttk-file-explorer

  3. Create New Branch 

    git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name

  4. Write Code or Documentation

    Code modifications in src/ directory Documentation modifications in docs/ directory

  5. Commit & Push 

    git add .
git commit -m "Describe your changes"
git push origin feature/your-feature-name

  6. Create Pull Request

    Click New Pull Request button on GitHub repository page

docs.title: Contribution Standards
docs.text:
• Coding Style Follow PEP8 standards.

  • Documentation Requirements All new features require accompanying documentation.

  • Testing Requirements Core features must include unit tests.

  • Commit Messages Clearly describe changes.

docs.title: More References
docs.text:
• Full Contribution Guide

  • Good First Issues

  • Submit Any Questions, Suggestions, or Ideas

Tip

Looking forward to your contributions!

docs.title: Only Latest Versions Receive Active Updates
docs.text:
Encountered an issue or have a suggestion?

Your feedback is crucial for improving ttk file explorer!

You can provide feedback through any of these methods:

GitHub Issues Start Discussion Email Comment Here

docs.title: Reporting Requirements
docs.text:
Please provide the following information

  1. Issue Description Problem encountered · Frequency and conditions of occurrence

  2. Reproduction Steps Step 1 · Step 2 · Observed result

  3. Environment Information OS version · Software version

  4. Additional Information Screenshots or screen recordings · Error logs (if available) · Contact details (optional)

docs.title: Reporting Guidelines
docs.text:
Report Type Priority Recommended Channel Critical BugCrash/data loss GitHub Issues Feature RequestNew feature/improvement suggestion Start Discussion or Comment Here Usage QuestionConfiguration/operation guidance Start Discussion or Comment Here

Tip

We'll address reports as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience and support!

docs.title: Pre-submission Checklist
docs.text:
• Searched existing issues
  • Included necessary environment information
  • Provided clear reproduction steps

docs.title: Comment Here
docs.text: You can submit feedback or suggestions directly on this page

docs.title: v1.0.0-beta (2025-1-26)
docs.text:
• Comprehensive project refactoring for improved maintainability
  • Redesigned UI components and layout
  • Resolved multiple known stability issues

docs.title: v0.3.0-beta (2023-12-10)
docs.text:
• Added icon display in file lists
  • Integrated system file operation APIs
  • Added right-click context menu functionality

docs.title: v0.2.0-beta (2023-11-5)
docs.text:
• Added custom theme functionality
  • Supported interface layout adjustments
  • Optimized icons and color schemes

docs.title: v0.1.0-beta (2023-10-5)
docs.text:
• Implemented basic file browsing functionality
  • Created basic UI framework
  • Initial release

docs.title: Planned Versions
docs.text:
Coming soon: v1.1.0-beta

graph LR
    A[Current Architecture] --> B[MVC Refactoring]
    B --> C[Feature Completion]
    C --> D[v1.1.0-beta]
    D --> E[More Stable Foundation]
    E --> F[Future Expansion]

docs.title: Architecture Refactoring
docs.text:
graph TD
    Model[Data Model] -->|Provides data| Controller
    View[User Interface] -->|Sends operations| Controller
    Controller -->|Updates data| Model
    Controller -->|Updates display| View

  • Model Layer: Separates data management and business logic

  • View Layer: Focuses on UI presentation and user interaction

  • Controller Layer: Coordinates interaction between Model and View

Core Objective

Implement a true MVC architecture.

docs.title: Feature Enhancement Plan
docs.text:
• File Operations Enhancement Advanced copy/move operations Search functionality optimization

  • UI Effects Optimization Custom layout presets Custom themes

  • System Integration Complete context menu Navigation optimization Customizable shortcuts

docs.title: Timeline Planning
docs.text:
Development Windows

Considering academic commitments, main development will occur during:

  • Winter break (January-February)
  • Summer break (July-August)

Occasional development and maintenance will continue during other periods.

docs.title: Participation Methods
docs.text:
• Development Assistance Contributions welcome from developers familiar with MVC architecture.

  • Testing & Feedback Experience beta versions and report issues.

  • Feature Suggestions Share ideas for file manager needs.

docs.title: Cross-Platform Notes
docs.text:
Current Platform Limitations

graph LR
    A[tkinter GUI] --> B[Cross-platform]
    C[File Operation API] --> D[Windows-only Implementation]
    D --> E[Deep System Integration]
    E --> F[Windows API Calls]
  • Although tkinter is cross-platform, the file operation API is currently implemented only for Windows.
  • macOS/Linux builds require rewriting the file operation module.
  • The current development environment is limited to Windows, and the source code only supports Windows builds.

docs.title: Python Version Compatibility
docs.text:
OS Python Version Notes Windows 7 ≤ 3.8 Last version supporting Win7 Windows 8/10/11 ≥ 3.7 Python 3.10+ recommended

Windows 7 Special Requirements

Due to DLL limitations in shared library linking, the last compatible Python version for Windows 7 is 3.8.

docs.title: System Environment Variables Configuration
docs.text:
May need manual setup before packaging

Key-Value Example
TCL_LIBRARY: tcl_library_path
TK_LIBRARY: tk_library_path
Why This Is Needed

On some systems (e.g., Windows 7), PyInstaller may fail to locate the init.tcl file, causing packaging failures.

docs.title: Required Dependencies
docs.text:
• Web Processing beautifulsoup4 · Markdown · Requests

  • Document Processing chardet · openpyxl · python_docx · python_pptx · fpdf

  • Image Processing Pillow

  • System Tools psutil · watchdog · winshell · pywin32 · pystray · darkdetect

  • Packaging Tools pyinstaller

  • UI Enhancement ttkbootstrap

docs.title: Build Steps
docs.text:
1. Prerequisites

    Ensure Python 3.x environment is installed

  2. Clone Repository 

    git clone https://github.com/pyheight/ttk-file-explorer.git

  3. Navigate to Source Directory 

    cd ttk-file-explorer/src

  4. Install Dependencies

    Install Specific Versions (Recommended)Install Latest Versions 
    pip install -r requirements.txt

    pip install -r requirements_latest.txt

  5. Launch Application 

    python main.py

  6. Package Application 

    python script/package.py

Encountering Issue

Let's Solve It

docs.text:
• License This project is licensed under the Apache-2.0 license.

  • Notice Free and open source | Strictly prohibited to sell | Welcome to share

  • Project Maintenance Currently maintained by the author alone, requiring significant personal time and effort. Welcome to contribute.

  • Support the Project Your support means a lot. Please give me a Star on GitHub!

docs.title: Download Latest Version
docs.text:
Current Latest Version:

Download from GitHub Baidu Netdisk :aliyunpan: Aliyun Drive

Security Notice

Secondary distribution of the software poses significant security risks. Please download only from official channels.

docs.title: Download Notes
docs.text:
• Installer Version (.exe) Suitable for most users · Creates Start Menu entries · Includes uninstaller

  • Portable Version (.zip) Run after extraction · No registry modifications · Ideal for USB drives

Tip

Both versions contain the same content. Either one is acceptable.

docs.title: Download Recommendations
docs.text: Channel Recommendation Speed Update Timeliness Supported File Types Notes  GitHub ★★★★★ ★★★★ Real-time .exe, .zip, .tar.gz Official preferred  Baidu Netdisk ★★★☆☆ ★★☆☆ Delayed .exe, .zip Requires login :aliyunpan: Aliyun Drive ★★★★☆ ★★★★ Delayed .exe Recommended backup

docs.title: Operating System
docs.text:
OS Support Minimum Version Notes Windows ✅ 7 Fully supported Windows ✅ 8/10/11 Best experience macOS ❌ Planned for future support Linux ❌ Planned for future support

Software Version Compatibility

  • v1.0.0-beta and above: Supports Windows 7 and later systems
  • Versions before v1.0.0-beta: Only supports Windows 10 and later systems

docs.title: Architecture Requirements
docs.text:
64-bit Systems 32-bit Systems

Reasons for not supporting 32-bit systems
  1. ttkbootstrap version limitations
  2. Compatibility issues with other dependencies
graph LR
    A[ttkbootstrap version limitations] -->|leads to| B(API limitations & lack of 32-bit support)
    D[Compatibility issues with other dependencies] -->|causes| E(File operation failures & dependency conflicts)
    B --> G[Unable to run]
    E --> G

docs.title: Hardware Requirements
docs.text:
Component Minimum Recommended Notes Processor 1 GHz single-core 2 GHz dual-core Modern processors perform better RAM 512 MB 1 GB Complex operations require more RAM Storage 50 MB free 100 MB free For program files and temporary storage Display 1024×768 resolution 1920×1080 resolution Higher resolution provides better experience

Tip

Most modern computers can easily meet these requirements.
